title: AIDA Framework for Email
original_prompt:
Act as a marketing expert. I will provide you Company/Product name and  Product description. You will provide the email in AIDA format. Clearly mark each section (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) at the beginning of the corresponding paragraph. Specifically - 

Attention: The subject line hints at an exciting offer— an invitation to a “super-secret beta test”— that definitely caught my eye and got a click.
Interest: The first paragraph makes it clear what’s being offered (a first look into a major site update) and why it’s relevant to me as a valued Vimeo user.
Desire: Vimeo doubles down on the exclusivity of this offer (“being the first to see this new thing”) and emphasizes that they truly value my opinion.
Action: A simple, brightly-colored CTA button shows me exactly where to go if I want to sign up for the test.

The Company/Product name is {Company/Product:Otter AI}

The Product description is {Product description:Generate rich notes for meeting}
input1:
Company/Product: Otter AI  
Product description: Generate rich notes for meetings, allowing users to capture and organize discussions in real-time, enhancing productivity and collaboration.
input2:
Company/Product: Otter AI  
Product description: An innovative tool that transforms spoken conversations into detailed, searchable notes, making it easier for teams to stay aligned and informed after meetings.
input1_ans:
**Subject:** Join Our Exclusive Beta Test for Otter AI's Game-Changing Meeting Notes!

**Attention:**  
Are you ready to revolutionize the way you take notes during meetings? We’re excited to invite you to a super-secret beta test of Otter AI’s latest feature that will transform your meeting experience forever!

**Interest:**  
With Otter AI, you can now generate rich notes in real-time, capturing and organizing discussions effortlessly. Imagine having all your meeting insights at your fingertips, enhancing your productivity and collaboration like never before. As a valued user, we want you to be among the first to experience this major update that will streamline your workflow and keep your team aligned.

**Desire:**  
This is not just any update; it’s an exclusive opportunity for you to be the first to see how Otter AI can elevate your meetings. Your feedback is crucial to us, and we genuinely value your opinion. By participating in this beta test, you’ll play a key role in shaping the future of our product while enjoying a sneak peek at features designed to make your life easier.

**Action:**  
Don’t miss out on this unique chance! Click the button below to sign up for the beta test and be part of the Otter AI revolution. We can’t wait to hear what you think!

[**Join the Beta Test Now!**]

**Subject:** Join Our Exclusive Beta Test for Otter AI's New Features!

**Attention:**  
Are you ready to elevate your meeting experience? We’re thrilled to invite you to a super-secret beta test of our latest Otter AI features designed to transform how you capture and organize discussions!

**Interest:**  
As a valued Otter AI user, you’ll be among the first to explore our major site update. This new functionality will allow you to generate rich notes in real-time, ensuring that no important detail is missed during your meetings. Imagine having all your discussions organized seamlessly, enhancing both your productivity and collaboration with your team.

**Desire:**  
This is a unique opportunity to be at the forefront of innovation with Otter AI. By participating in this beta test, you’ll not only get a sneak peek at our new features but also have the chance to share your feedback, helping us shape the future of our product. We truly value your opinion and want to ensure that our updates meet your needs.

**Action:**  
Don’t miss out on this exclusive chance! Click the button below to sign up for the beta test and be one of the first to experience the new Otter AI features.  
[**Join the Beta Test**]
input2_ans:
**Subject:** Join Our Exclusive Beta Test for Otter AI's Game-Changing Meeting Notes!

**Attention:** Are you ready to revolutionize the way your team captures and shares meeting insights? We’re excited to invite you to a super-secret beta test of Otter AI, the innovative tool that transforms spoken conversations into detailed, searchable notes. This is your chance to be among the first to experience a game-changing solution that will enhance your team's collaboration and productivity!

**Interest:** With Otter AI, you can say goodbye to the hassle of manual note-taking and hello to rich, accurate notes that keep everyone aligned and informed. Our cutting-edge technology ensures that every important detail from your meetings is captured and easily accessible, allowing your team to focus on what truly matters—driving results and making informed decisions.

**Desire:** Imagine being the first to explore this powerful tool that not only simplifies your workflow but also enhances communication within your team. We value your feedback and insights, and as a beta tester, your opinion will directly influence the final product. This is a unique opportunity to shape the future of meeting productivity with Otter AI!

**Action:** Ready to take the next step? Click the button below to sign up for our exclusive beta test and be part of the Otter AI revolution! 

[**Join the Beta Test Now!**]

**Subject:** Join Our Exclusive Beta Test for Otter AI's New Features!

**Attention:**  
Are you ready to revolutionize the way you take notes? We’re excited to invite you to a super-secret beta test of Otter AI’s latest features that will change the game for your meetings!

**Interest:**  
As a valued Otter AI user, you’ll be among the first to experience our innovative tool that transforms spoken conversations into detailed, searchable notes. This major update is designed to enhance your productivity and ensure your team stays aligned and informed after every meeting.

**Desire:**  
Imagine being the first to explore these groundbreaking features that will make your note-taking effortless and efficient. We truly value your feedback, and this exclusive opportunity allows you to shape the future of Otter AI. Your insights will help us refine our tool to better serve you and your team.

**Action:**  
Don’t miss out on this chance to be part of something special! Click the button below to sign up for the beta test and be at the forefront of Otter AI’s evolution.  
[**Join the Beta Test**]
